definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Analysis of harmonic response of unconstrained damped plate based on randomness of viscoelastic damping layer;
sentences.chinese: 本文用谐波增量平衡法分析纵横向耦合梁的谐波响应。

sentences.english: Investment and net exports generated close to three-quarters of China's incremental demand in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，投资和净出口占中国需求增量的近四分之三。

sentences.english: The adjusted increment method can change the trial method of hydraulic calculation into direct calculation.
sentences.chinese: 增量调整法可将水力计算中的试算变为直接计算。

sentences.english: Incremental encoders without bearings for drives with large axial play or high speeds.
sentences.chinese: 无轴承的驱动器增量式编码器与大型轴向或高速行驶。

sentences.english: Bring up the TRANS INCR menu.
It also supports incremental file updates.
sentences.chinese: 此外，它还支持增量式的文件更新。

sentences.english: Do incremental builds and tests on every delivery before the delivery is committed.
sentences.chinese: 在每一次交付之前都要对其进行增量构建和测试。

sentences.english: However, it is misleading to look at the ICOR for a single year.
sentences.chinese: 然而，仅看单年的增量资本传出率会有所误导。

sentences.english: Standard solutions for determination of iron pick-up in acid solution are required prior to pickling operation.
sentences.chinese: 酸浸之前应该采用标准溶液确定酸液中铁增量。

sentences.english: The system can provide 30 or 60 delta modulation digital voice channels.
sentences.chinese: 系统能提供30或60增量调制音频信道。

sentences.english: "Generally, we do incremental changes, " he says.
sentences.chinese: “一般说来，我们做增量变化”他说。

sentences.english: Most of the time during an iteration is spent on executing the micro-increments.
sentences.chinese: 迭代中的大多数时间用于执行微增量。

sentences.english: The M100 can test all popular incremental encoder configurations.
sentences.chinese: 在M100可以测试所有流行的增量编码器配置。

sentences.english: Because some increments are apparently more equal than others.
sentences.chinese: 因为显然增量相同，重要性可以不同。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the increment distribution and self-similarity of typical underwater images.
sentences.chinese: 分析了水下散射图像的增量分布及自相似特性。

sentences.english: This process could be repeated to add the incremental backups if required.
sentences.chinese: 在需要的时候，可以重复这个过程来添加增量备份。

definition: to slow down/to ease up/to abate/slowdown/downturn
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
prices scissor (caught between low income and high prices)
